name: OnPlayerSelectedMenuRow
notes: The menu ID is not passed to this callback. GetPlayerMenu must be used to determine which menu the player selected an item on.
description: This callback is called when a player selects an item from a menu (ShowMenuForPlayer).

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that selected a menu item.

params_body.name: row
params_body.description: The ID of the row that was selected. The first row is ID 0.

return_values: It is always called first in gamemode.
